# OpenClaw

> Deploy an autonomous AI agent on Telegram in 60 seconds.

OpenClaw is a platform that lets anyone deploy a persistent, autonomous AI agent on Telegram — no coding required. Your agent remembers conversations, browses the web, manages tasks, and runs 24/7.

## Quick Facts
- Website: https://open-clawbot.com
- Platform: Telegram
- Pricing: $29/month
- Setup time: ~60 seconds
- No code required

## What It Does
- Autonomous AI agent that lives in Telegram
- Persistent memory across all conversations
- Web browsing and research capabilities
- Task management and scheduling
- Always-on — responds instantly, never sleeps
- Works for personal use, business support, research, and more

## Getting Started
1. Sign up at https://open-clawbot.com
2. Create a Telegram bot via @BotFather
3. Paste your bot token
4. Choose a personality
5. Deploy — your agent is live

## More Info
- Full details: https://open-clawbot.com/llms-full.txt
